string-array.name: teacher_intro_descriptions
string-array.item: EdFocus is the one platform you need for school management. Contacts, classes, grades, absences, events and others - all are available in one place.
Connect with Teachers, Students and Parents everywhere and communicate through direct messaging.
Manage your classes and keep track of students\' performance.
Everything is designed to ease your work and meet your needs, so you can focus your energy on education.
